title: The phone has turned off and won't turn on
content:
I was watching YouTube when the phone was frozen. He didn't start so I decided to restart him. And after this he didn't turn on. I can't even turn off it as phone turns on, after Google logo ("G") stops, turns off and again turns on. Do not even know what to do. Please, help

UPDATE: after a lot of tries phone turned on, I only had time to enter the password and open app menu. After this it turned off again and repeat turn on-off now.

UPDATE 2: it turned on and I was able to close all apps, but it turned off anyway; after few attempts pixel turned on and even worked until I tried to open Play Market (the first app I've openned after start). So, now it's doing "turn on-off" again.
